---
title: "Raw Material Color Groups"
---

Compare Gahagan biface color.

```{r color, out.width = "100%", dpi = 300, echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(here)
library(colordistance)

# get image paths + convert from rgb to CIELab
image.paths <- colordistance::getImagePaths('la.gahagan')

# CIELab clusters
lab.hist.list <- colordistance::getLabHistList(image.paths,
                                               bins = 4,
                                               bin.avg = TRUE,
                                               sample.size = 100000,
                                               ref.white = 'D65', 
                                               lower = rep(0.8, 3), 
                                               upper = rep(1, 3))

## plot
lab.dist.matrix <- colordistance::getColorDistanceMatrix(lab.hist.list,
                                                         method = 'emd',
                                                         plotting = TRUE)
```
